ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

skillTree.name: Supple & Spry
skillTree.description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.

skillTree.name: Hates Khorne
skillTree.description: This obsession with murder is just cheap, mindless bloodlust of the basest kind. To the servants of Slaanesh, there's so much more to life… and to death too, of course.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Khornate factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Khornate factions

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Barded Chaos Steed (Mount)
skillTree.description: Enables the Barded Chaos Steed (Mount)

skillTree.name: Chaos Dragon (Mount)
skillTree.description: Enables the Chaos Dragon (Mount)

skillTree.name: Faultless Duelist
skillTree.description: A veteran of the duel, a peerless swordsman and an exquisite example of fighting form. Those who lock swords with him do so at their peril.

skillTree.name: Glutton for Punishment
skillTree.description: This warrior revels in every sensation - even ones that would slay a lesser mortal outright.

skillTree.name: Rapid Ruination
skillTree.description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Unbound Arrogance
skillTree.description: This man´s pride and hubris is both his greatest strength and his biggest weakness.

skillTree.name: Honour the Prince
skillTree.description: Warriors who venerate Slaanesh through fighting form are rewarded in their endeavours.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +2 for Marauder, Hellstrider, Rider, and Servant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +4 for Marauder, Hellstrider, Rider, and Servant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +4 for Marauder, Hellstrider, Rider, and Servant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +6 for Marauder, Hellstrider, Rider, and Servant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for Marauder, Hellstrider, Rider, and Servant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +8 for Marauder, Hellstrider, Rider, and Servant units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Symphony of Pain
skillTree.description: The noise of the battle, the howls of the fighters, the cries and the screams of the wounded... all are music to the ears of Slaanesh followers, who always crave for more.

effects.description:
Melee Defence: +4 for Chaos Fury, Spawn, Fiend, Daemonette, and Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +5% for Chaos Fury, Spawn, Fiend, Daemonette, and Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +6 for Chaos Fury, Spawn, Fiend, Daemonette, and Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for Chaos Fury, Spawn, Fiend, Daemonette, and Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence: +8 for Chaos Fury, Spawn, Fiend, Daemonette, and Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Chaos Fury, Spawn, Fiend, Daemonette, and Chaos Warrior units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Engines of Torture
skillTree.description: Metal should not feel pleasure and joy when flaying bodies and souls, but then Slaanesh would find them boring.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Soul Grinder, Seeker Chariot, Hellflayer, and Exalted Seeker Chariot unit
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Soul Grinder, Seeker Chariot, Hellflayer, and Exalted Seeker Chariot unit
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +8 for Soul Grinder, Seeker Chariot, Hellflayer, and Exalted Seeker Chariot unit
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Soul Grinder, Seeker Chariot, Hellflayer, and Exalted Seeker Chariot unit
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Soul Grinder, Seeker Chariot, Hellflayer, and Exalted Seeker Chariot unit
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Soul Grinder, Seeker Chariot, Hellflayer, and Exalted Seeker Chariot unit
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Excess of Violence
skillTree.description: The visceral sensation of every fresh kill causes the warriors devoted to the Dark Prince to enter an ecstatic frenzy of butchery and dismemberment.

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +5 for Seeker, Heartseeker, Knight, Aspiring Champion, and Slaangor unit
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +5% for Seeker, Heartseeker, Knight, Aspiring Champion, and Slaangor unit
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +7 for Seeker, Heartseeker, Knight, Aspiring Champion, and Slaangor unit
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for Seeker, Heartseeker, Knight, Aspiring Champion, and Slaangor unit
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +9 for Seeker, Heartseeker, Knight, Aspiring Champion, and Slaangor unit
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Seeker, Heartseeker, Knight, Aspiring Champion, and Slaangor unit
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Incessant Disdain
skillTree.description: Contempt for lesser fighters drives the greatest and most prideful warriors into a furore.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +4 for Exalted Daemonette, Heartseeker, Chosen, Knight of Torment, Dragon Ogre, and Keeper of Secret units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +5% for Exalted Daemonette, Heartseeker, Chosen, Knight of Torment, Dragon Ogre, and Keeper of Secret units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for Exalted Daemonette, Heartseeker, Chosen, Knight of Torment, Dragon Ogre, and Keeper of Secret units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for Exalted Daemonette, Heartseeker, Chosen, Knight of Torment, Dragon Ogre, and Keeper of Secret units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +8 for Exalted Daemonette, Heartseeker, Chosen, Knight of Torment, Dragon Ogre, and Keeper of Secret units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Exalted Daemonette, Heartseeker, Chosen, Knight of Torment, Dragon Ogre, and Keeper of Secret units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Acolytes of Hedonism
skillTree.description: The endless pursuit of hedonistic delights further corrupts even the most depraved of creatures.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, Chosen of Slaanesh, Marauders of Slaanesh, Daemonettes of Slaanesh and Exalted Daemonettes of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Connoisseurs of Delight
skillTree.description: The true veterans of battle exude an aura of rapturous fulfilment, dulling the senses of their lessers.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Hellstriders of Slaanesh, Knights of Slaanesh, Seekers of Slaanesh, Forsaken of Slaanesh and Heartseekers of Slaanesh units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Killer's Kiss
skillTree.description: The kiss of a lover, or the kiss of a blade – the decadence's Devotees will have you begging for both!

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Seeker Chariots, Exalted Seeker Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Marauder Horsemen and Hellflayers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Secret Keeper
skillTree.description: There is no end to the power a being holds once it can tug at your wildest fantasies and twist your darkest fears.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +6 for Chaos Furies, Spawn of Slaanesh, Fiends of Slaanesh, Soul Grinder, Chaos Warshrine and Keeper of Secrets units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Slaves to Excess
skillTree.description: The Perfect Prince can never have too many Devotees. It matters not one jot to Slaanesh whether they come to him willingly or are coerced into His worship.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Drawn to Decadence
skillTree.description: Having given itself willingly to the service of Slaanesh, this force requires neither the carrot nor the stick to fight for Him though either one would no doubt be pleasurable!

skillTree.name: Relentless Advance
skillTree.description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Promise of Perfection
skillTree.description: The Prince of Pleasure whispers in the ears of all, pulling at the threads of their every deviant desire.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Enslaver
backgroundSkills.description: "I'm bored," said the perverse Lord of Excess. "What playthings can you offer me today?"

backgroundSkills.name: Siren
backgroundSkills.description: This one's eerily seductive beauty has proved to be most useful both in the bedroom and on the battlefield.

backgroundSkills.name: Perfectionist
backgroundSkills.description: Flawlessness is not an unattainable goal for those who serve the Perfect Prince; for the chosen few, it can be a reality.

backgroundSkills.name: Depraver
backgroundSkills.description: Even the purest, most virtuous soul can be distorted to vile perversion or inveterate depravity if the right sort of temptation is offered.
